title: What Makes ‘The Great’ So ... Great?
description:
Joanna Robinson and Chris Ryan break down their thoughts and feelings about why 'The Great' is such an underrated show and discuss the first couple of episodes of the second season, which just dropped on Hulu.
Hosts: Joanna Robinson and Chris Ryan
Associate Producer: Sasha Ashall
